oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: World War I discharge certificate for Lucian W. Rye
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This discharge certificate is for Pvt. Lucian W. Rye, Co. B, 163rd Inf. Regt. He served in this unit from October to December 1918. He later served in Co. 238, Prisoner of War Escort from December 1918 to October 1919. Rye was from Houston County, Tennessee. He trained at Camp Gordon, Georgia and received his discharge there as well. Folded in with the certificate is a protective cover provided by the YMCA.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
